actions.text: On agreeing to the Meek (FL) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits the importation of meat or poultry food products unless those products meet the same health and safety standards as domestically produced products.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 and printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the importation of meat or poultry food products unless these products meet the same health and safety standards as domestically produced products.
